name: Last.fm - Grey'n'Blue
description: A dark grey version of Last.fm. Works great with my other styles.
additional_info:
0.9 Almost there, needs some little tweaks.
0.91 Ermmm, it needed a lot more of little tweaks. Next version will include a lot more (alternative picture versions will also help a lot). Largest reason has been the Recommendations-pages since all of the artist images disappeared (made a separate-style for those) and changing from bright grey to black or no lines.
0.92 Made a small edit that removes that new white-png element.
